name: Keyboard Scrolling
description:
Scroll around a Figma document using your keyboard arrow keys.


While zooming in and out of a Figma page is possible via a mouse / trackpad or keyboard shortcuts, the ability to scroll and pan around a Figma page is currently constrained to mouse / trackpad interactions and therefore somewhat inaccessible to users who don't use a mouse / trackpad input.


*This plugin is primarily meant for designers using voice recognition solutions who aren't able to scroll easily otherwise
